page.title: 09Education In Blacon
page.content: There are several types of Schools in Blacon.{ { Infant Schools}take children from the age of 5 to the age of 7 they include:Highfield Infant School,Saint Theresa's Infant School,J.H Godwin Infant School,Dee Point Infant School, Blacon Hall Infant School,five in all. {Junior Schools}have children from the age of 7 up to 11.They include: Highfield Junior,Our Lady of Mount Carmel Junior,Dee Point Junior,Blacon Hall Junior,J.H Godwin Primary. {High Schools}take people from the age of 11 to 18 there is only one High School in Blacon that is Blacon High School. There is a{College}of Further Education on Blacon Avenue.There are also several{play-groups} in the area.
